subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Chelsea beat Manchester City, 1-0, to move within 4 points of Manchester United in the Premier League standings. Michael Essien scored Chelsea’s 18th-minute winner at Stamford Bridge as the Blues made it four league victories in a row since the temporary coach Guus Hiddink replaced Luiz Felipe Scolari. E.P.L.
